caption.title: Total atomic structure of the Au 144(SCH 2Ph) 60 nanoparticle resolved by XRC.
caption.p: ( A) Dextroisomer of Au 144(SCH 2Ph) 60. Yellow, gold; green, sulfur; gray, carbon; white, hydrogen. ( B) Parallel hexahedron unit cell containing a pair of enantiomers. The left- and right-handed enantiomers are colored in magenta and yellow, respectively.
